The NSC-R Tidy Tuesday workshop sessions are inspired by the [Tidy Tuesday](https://www.tidytuesday.com/) initiative, which is aimed at providing a safe and supportive forum for individuals to practice their data processing and visualization skills in R while working with real-world data.

This workshop (February 6, 2024, 13:00-14:00 CET) will be led by Alex Trinidad. Please join us  on Zoom by clicking [here](https://us02web.zoom.us/j/4539912989) using password *NSCR*.


> *Alex Trinidad* is a postdoctoral researcher and lecturer at the Institute of Sociology and Social Psychology (ISS) at the University of Cologne. He is a research fellow at the NSCR, and a member of the NSC-R Workshops team.

The materials for the workshop will be made available here.
